snippet: Texas has reached a settlement with the online daily fantasy sports site FanDuel that requires the company to stop accepting paid entries for cash prizes statewide on May 2.
abstract: Settlement with Texas allows Daily fantasy sports site FanDuel to continue to run free games but not accept paid entries for cash prizes in state.
lead_paragraph: Texas has reached a settlement with the online daily fantasy sports site FanDuel that requires the company to stop accepting paid entries for cash prizes statewide on May 2.
